title: Sing 2
stars: Matthew McConaughey, Reese Witherspoon, Scarlett Johansson
movieSummary: Buster Moon and his friends must persuade reclusive rock star Clay Calloway to join them for the opening of a new show.

title: The Man From Toronto
writer: Robbie Fox, Chris Bremmer, Jason Blumenthal
stars: Kevin Hart, Woody Harrelson, Jasmine Mathews
movieSummary: The world's deadliest assassin and New York's biggest screw-up are mistaken for each other at an Airbnb rental.

title: Hustle
stars: Adam Sandler, Queen Latifah, Juancho hernangomez
movieSummary: A basketball scout discovers a phenomenal street ball player while in Spain and sees the prospect as his opportunity to get back into the NBA.

title: Red Notice
stars: Dwayne Johnson, Ryan Reynolds, Gal Gadot
movieSummary: An Interpol agent successfully tracks down the world's most wanted art thief, with help from a rival thief. But nothing is as it seems, as a series of double-crosses ensue.

title: Mean Girls
stars: Lindsay Lohan, Jonathan Bennett, Rachel McAdams
movieSummary: Cady Heron is a hit with The Plastics, the A-list girl clique at her new school, until she makes the mistake of falling for Aaron Samuels, the ex-boyfriend of alpha Plastic Regina George.

title: The Adam Project
writer: Jonathan Tropper, T.S. Nowlin, Jennifer Flackett
stars: Ryan Reynolds, Walker Scobell, Mark Ruffalo
movieSummary: After accidentally crash-landing in 2022, time-traveling fighter pilot Adam Reed teams up with his 12-year-old self for a mission to save the future.

title: The Amazing Spider-Man
writer: James Vanderbilt, Alvin Sargent, Steve Kloves
stars: Andrew Garfield, Emma Stone, Rhys Ifans
movieSummary: After Peter Parker is bitten by a genetically altered spider, he gains newfound, spider-like powers and ventures out to save the city from the machinations of a mysterious reptilian foe.

title: The Dark Knight Rises
writer: Jonathan Nolan, Christopher Nolan, David S. Goyer
stars: Christian Bale, Tom Hardy, Anne Hathaway
movieSummary: Eight years after the Joker's reign of anarchy, Batman, with the help of the enigmatic Catwoman, is forced from his exile to save Gotham City from the brutal guerrilla terrorist Bane.

title: A Madea Homecoming
stars: Tyler Perry, Cassi Davis, David Mann
movieSummary: Madea's back hallelujer. And she's not putting up with any nonsense as family drama erupts at her great-grandson's college graduation celebration.

title: Back to the Outback
stars: Eric Bana, Tim Minchin, Miranda Tapsell
movieSummary: Tired of being locked in a reptile house where humans gawk at them like they're monsters, a group of Australia's deadliest creatures plot a daring escape from their zoo to the Outback.
